property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then choose one of your opponent's creatures that costs less than the number of cards in your graveyard and destroy it.

property.value: {ABYSS RUSH} You may summon this creature from your graveyard. If you do, this creature can attack players this turn and is put on the bottom of your deck at the end of the turn. ■ When you put this creature, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard.

property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures. Then put the same number of cards as that creature's cost from the top of your deck into your graveyard.

property.value: ■ When you put this creature, each of your opponent's creatures gets -2000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) ■ Each turn, the first time a creature is destroyed, you may draw a card.

property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, draw 2 cards.
